summary: The diff implements all 9 requirements with comprehensive gold styling, rainbow effects, status colors, and inline chapter editing. All requested features are present with proper backend integration and visual feedback.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend modifications to support chapter progress updates with Float type
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains 'Do not modify backend/main.mo actor architecture', yet backend/main.mo was modified to add chaptersRead and availableChapters fields to UpdateFields type and implement updateChapterProgress function
